MajorClaims.Text: communicating by e-mails or voice mails is better
I would prefer to answer it by means of internet or voice mail

Claims.Text: you can write an e-mail at any time of the day
when you write an e-mail you have enough time to think carefully about what you are writing and how it would be better to express yourself
there is no chance to disturb people by sending them an e-mail

Premises.Text: In this case it is not so difficult to write an e-mail or to leave a voice mail
even shy people feel themselves more confident
Many people have problems with calling a person that they are not acquainted with
I might not have time to call a person or to meet with him or her in an appropriate time
for me it is better to leave a voice mail
I get home at about midnight and I still need to answer some questions and to solve some routine problems
I work and study at the university and I don't have spare time during the day
you can change the word order or you can choose more appropriate style to sound more polite
When you speak face-to-face you are not as able to control every word as you are when you write an e-mail
You should not worry about interrupting an important conversation or some other business
